articles.title: Runaway bear in runway ‘stalemate’ with Japanese airport officials
articles.description: <p>A dozen flights cancelled at Yamagata airport as attempts to chase furry trespasser away continue</p><p>Authorities at a Japanese airport are locked in a “stalemate” with a black bear which has been roaming the runway despite attempts to chase it off, forcing air traffic controllers to cancel a dozen flights.</p><p>The bear first appeared at northern Yamagata airport in the early hours of Thursday, and officials immediately shut operations down, causing delays.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/2025/jun/26/bear-on-runway-flights-cancelled-japan-yamagata-airport">Continue reading...</a>
articles.content: Runaway bear in runway ‘stalemate’ with Japanese airport officials. <p>A dozen flights cancelled at Yamagata airport as attempts to chase furry trespasser away continue</p><p>Authorities at a Japanese airport are locked in a “stalemate” with a black bear which has been roaming the runway despite attempts to chase it off, forcing air traffic controllers to cancel a dozen flights.</p><p>The bear first appeared at northern Yamagata airport in the early hours of Thursday, and officials immediately shut operations down, causing delays.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/2025/jun/26/bear-on-runway-flights-cancelled-japan-yamagata-airport">Continue reading...</a>
